summary: OpenAI has NOT filed an S-1 as of Feb 7, 2026. CFO targets 2027 listing, earliest S-1 filing expected H2 2026. Manifold IPO by end March 2026 at ~1.4%. Metaculus CP at 10%.
content:
Key findings:
1. OpenAI has NOT filed an S-1 with SEC as of Feb 7, 2026
2. CFO Sarah Friar indicated targeting a 2027 listing
3. Company considering filing with regulators as early as H2 2026
4. Company accelerating prep for Q4 2026 IPO
5. Holding informal discussions with Wall Street banks
6. Manifold: 'Will OpenAI IPO by end March 2026?' at 1.4% probability
7. Manifold: 'Will OpenAI file for IPO during 2026?' at 58.8%
8. Metaculus CP: 10% for S-1 before March 15, 2026
9. Scott Galloway predicts OpenAI could pull IPO amid AI 'vibe shift'
10. No Polymarket market found for this specific question
